item.title: Customizing the string representation of your objects
item.description:
Description

You'll almost always just want to customize one of Python's two string representations (repr, the programmer readable-one). The human-readable representation (str) delegates to repr by default.
item.dc:creator: Trey Hunner

item.title: Dunder methods in Python
item.description:
Description

Dunder methods power most operators in Python as well as some of the built-in functions. Dunder methods are a contract between the person who made a class and Python itself.
item.dc:creator: Trey Hunner
